# Outcomes

This module introduces some more complex join operations.

- Use a self-join
- Understand how to rename fields to use the same field multiple times
- Write a subquery to simplify data manipulations.

Optional Resources:

- [YouTube: How to do subqueries](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GpC0XyiJPEo)

### Reference Code

> SELECT Employees.FirstName, boss.FirstName FROM Employees
> LEFT OUTER JOIN Employees as boss
> ON Employees.ReportsTo = boss.EmployeeID
